comment: /**  * Handle the given exception. A completion signal through the return value  * indicates error handling is complete while an error signal indicates the  * exception is still not handled.  * @param exchange the current exchange  * @param ex the exception to handle  * @return {@code Mono<Void>} to indicate when exception handling is complete  */
code: /**  * Handle the given exception. A completion signal through the return value  * indicates error handling is complete while an error signal indicates the  * exception is still not handled.  * @param exchange the current exchange  * @param ex the exception to handle  * @return {@code Mono<Void>} to indicate when exception handling is complete  */ Mono<Void> handle(ServerWebExchange exchange, Throwable ex).
